threat: A remote attacker could use this flaw to damage or destroy files within a server's data directory.
An authenticated attacker could use this flaw to possibly guess another database user's random numbers.
An unprivileged attacker could use this flaw to possibly interfere with in-progress backups.
special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
This update uses a new upstream release, which includes additional bug
fixes. In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary
changes.
